I'm thinking more like a headset phone, it would be audio only, only 
the one sending wouldn't use vocal circuits.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> OOC:( If your talking about transmitting like a cellphone, then why 
> have commlinks when a bot could just "dial" directly to another 
bot?)
> 
> 
>
